articles.description: Vicky Prendergast, 34, from West Derby in Liverpool, met Dave while walking past a chip shop, and stopped to listen to his heartbreaking story before going on to change his life
articles.content:
A widower who only had a Creme Egg for Christmas dinner had his life transformed by a kind woman who he met on the street.
